arts.ttl: Why Alex Greenwood was always destined to lead Man City
arts.sum: Speaking in a press conference last week, Taylor outlined why Greenwood was the right choice to wear the armband, but also confirmed she will be part of a wider leadership group that will share the responsibility moving forward. Few players have what it takes to step into the shoes vacated by Steph Houghton at the end of last season, but Greenwood is undoubtedly the right fit.
